text:
@GOP @realDonaldTrump The most vulnerable among us were hurting long before the coronavirus 

@GOP is using poor communities as a flashpoint to reopen schools and the economy only, they’re the most at risk given many work in service jobs w contact with the public all for below livable wages https://t.co/vNFIyJIoSf
